title: A Hickory Ridge Christmas
description: A minister's daughter and unwed teen five years ago Hannah Woods had been the talk of Hickory Ridge. Her little girl was the light of her life, though Hannah was unable to forgive the one who'd loved her—and then left.Todd McBride had left town a boy and returned a man with a to find the woman he still adored and ask for a second chance. But Hannah's secret—a child he'd never known about—threw his plans into a tailspin.With Christmas rapidly approaching, it seemed the time for love and forgiveness was at hand….
author: Dana Corbit
